body.name: Fiskars Wood Ruler - 12" Straight Edge Ruler for Kids - Back to School Supplies for Students
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 57 mins
features: SCHOOL SUPPLIES FOR KIDS: Fiskars Wooden Ruler is great for the first day of school or for arts & crafts projects at home; Ideal for kids of all ages; #1 teacher-recommended brand

PRECISION ART SUPPLIES: Easy-to-read inch and centimeter marks for accurate measuring; Plastic edge holds a straight line for ease of use; Hang hole offers convenient storage for use at school or at home
LONG LASTING AND RELIABLE: A dependable classroom essential and great addition to school supplies for kids & teachers; Fiskars craft supplies and materials are built to last
CONVENIENT MEASURING: Easy-to-read inch and centimeter marks makes measuring easy

QUALITY TOOLS FOR ARTS AND CRAFTS: From scissors and cutting mats, rotary and paper cutters, to classroom essentials, and quilting and scrapbooking supplies, Fiskars school and crafting tools are designed to help you do what you do best: express yourself
INCLUDES: 1 Fiskars 12" Wood Ruler; Limited lifetime warranty
body.description: Fiskars Wood Ruler offers the traditional feel of wooden rulers with easy-to-read inch and centimeter marks for accurate measuring. Ideal for school supplies for kids or teacher supplies, this inch and centimeter ruler has a plastic edge that holds a straight line, ensuring long-lasting use from the first to the last day of school. Plus, a hang hole in the middle of this 12 inch ruler offers convenient storage. Great addition to classroom supplies, teacher supplies, and back to school supplies.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us Established in 1649 as an ironworks in a small Finnish village of the same name, Fiskars has grown to become a global supplier of consumer products for the home, garden and outdoors. Available in more than 60 countries, Fiskars products solve everyday problems, making daily home, garden and outdoor projects easier and more enjoyable through superior performance and design. In 1783, the ironworks was taken over by the Bjorkman family and production focused on processing copper ore from the nearby Orijarvi copper mine. By the nineteenth century there was little copper left to be mined in Orijarvi, so the blast furnace was closed in 1802. Since then there has been no basic iron manufacturing done in Fiskars Village.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Epic Journey of Fiskars 01-005358 Wood Ruler: A Tale of Measurement and Adventure!
reviews.reviewText: Oh, the wonders of the Fiskars 01-005358 Back to School Supplies Wood Ruler, 12 Inch! Let me regale you with the epic journey this seemingly humble measuring device took me on.From the moment I laid eyes on this wooden wonder, I knew I was in for a wild ride. The sleek, polished surface beckoned me, promising precise measurements and mathematical glory. Little did I know, it had much more in store for me.As I gripped the ruler firmly in my hand, I could feel its power coursing through my fingertips. It was as if I held a tool that could shape the very fabric of the universe (or at least my geometry homework). With a flick of the wrist, I set off on my adventure.The ruler effortlessly glided across the page, leaving behind a trail of perfectly straight lines. It had a way of making me feel like a master artist, meticulously sketching diagrams with unparalleled precision. I was the Michelangelo of geometry, armed with the mighty Fiskars ruler.But the true magic of this ruler unfolded when I least expected it. One fateful day, as I was measuring the length of a pencil, the ruler whispered to me. Yes, you read that right—this ruler spoke! Okay, maybe it didn't speak in the literal sense, but it whispered encouragement, filling me with newfound confidence."Measure fearlessly," it seemed to say. "With me in your hand, no measurement is too daunting." And so I did. I measured everything in sight: the length of my cat's tail (12 inches, just like the ruler), the width of my bedroom door (twice the ruler's length), and even the circumference of a pizza slice (don't ask). Each measurement was a triumph, an affirmation of my ruler-wielding prowess.But alas, every adventure must come to an end. After many months of conquering the measurement realm, my trusted Fiskars 01-005358 Wood Ruler started to show signs of wear. Its edges softened, and a few battle scars appeared. It had fought countless battles on my behalf, after all.So here I stand, at the end of this remarkable journey, bidding farewell to my faithful measuring companion. The memories we shared, the lines we drew, and the secrets it whispered will forever be etched in my mind.In conclusion, the Fiskars 01-005358 Back to School Supplies Wood Ruler, 12 Inch, is not just a measuring tool. It's a vessel of inspiration, a companion on a quest for accuracy, and a whisperer of encouragement. Whether you're a student, an artist, or an aspiring mathematician, this ruler will take you on an epic adventure—one measurement at a time. Embrace its power, and let it guide you to greatness.Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5 out of 5 stars)

reviews.reviewTitle: "Measure with Precision and Craftsmanship: Unleashing the Potential of the Fiskars 8 12 Inch Ruler
reviews.reviewText: In a world inundated with high-tech gadgets and gizmos, it's refreshing to find solace in a tool as simple yet indispensable as the Fiskars 01-005358 12 Inch Wooden Ruler (01-005359). Let me take you on a journey through my experience with this unassuming yet extraordinary piece of craftsmanship.Upon first laying eyes on the Fiskars wooden ruler, I was immediately struck by its timeless design and the undeniable aura of quality it exudes. The smooth, polished wood evokes a sense of nostalgia while promising durability that can stand the test of time. As someone who appreciates the fusion of form and function, this ruler ticked all the right boxes right from the start.But let's talk about its real superpower – precision. The clear, easy-to-read markings etched onto the wood are a testament to Fiskars' commitment to accuracy. Whether I was measuring fabric for a sewing project, marking dimensions for a DIY woodworking endeavor, or simply assisting my kids with their school projects, the ruler's measurements were consistently spot-on. No more squinting or straining my eyes to decipher measurements – the Fiskars ruler makes precision effortless.Beyond its precision, the ruler's versatility also caught my attention. The 12-inch length, complemented by both imperial and metric measurements, makes it an all-in-one solution for a myriad of tasks. Its sleek design ensures a comfortable grip, allowing for steady and controlled measurements, even during prolonged use. It's a tool that seamlessly transitions from the professional workspace to the creative studio, effortlessly adapting to the user's needs.Moreover, the Fiskars ruler boasts impeccable durability. It has survived accidental drops, occasional rough handling, and the inevitable wear and tear that comes with being a frequently used tool. This longevity not only speaks to the quality of the materials but also the meticulous craftsmanship that goes into every inch of this ruler.In a world where complexity often overshadows simplicity, the Fiskars 01-005358 12 Inch Wooden Ruler (01-005359) stands as a testament to the enduring elegance of well-designed tools. Its precision, versatility, and durability make it a must-have addition to any workspace or toolbox. Whether you're a professional, a hobbyist, or simply someone who values accuracy, this ruler will undoubtedly exceed your expectations. Embrace the craftsmanship, embrace the precision – unleash the potential of Fiskars.
I am using it to put my beads on when I’m making bracelets. It measures and keeps my beads in line
